usersEndpoints.post: @/users - create a new user - body(name: required, email: required).
usersEndpoints.put: @/users/:userId - replace a user with another user - body(name: required, email: required).
usersEndpoints.patch: @/users/:userId - update an existing user - body(name: optional, email: optional).

postsEndpoints.post: @/posts - create a new post - body(text: required, image: optional, createdBy: required)  - NOTE: posting a post requires using form-data.
postsEndpoints.get: @/posts/ - retrieve all posts - query(userId=<userId> - filters posts by specific user).
